creator: OBCC GmbH & Co. KG, services & research
descriptionHtml:
bp delivers heat, light and mobility products and services to people all around the world in ways that will help to drive the transition to a lower carbon future.

We have a diverse portfolio across businesses, resource types and geographies. Having upstream, downstream and renewables businesses, along with well-established trading capabilities, helps to mitigate the impact of commodity pricing cycles. Our geographic reach gives us access to growing markets and new resources, as well as diversifying exposure to geopolitical events.

The bp Contractor Communication & Safety App is a digital solution and has been designed to focus on and improve communication and safety purposes for Refining and European Retail Contractors.

This app helps bp to make a real ‘quantum leap’ in communicating with and engaging our contractors.
descriptionShort: bp Contractor Communication&Safety is a digital solution improving communication

appDetails.developerName: OBCC GmbH & Co. KG, services & research
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improvements in usability like utilizing same QR for download and login as well as improvement on performance and stability are coming with this update.

appDetails.developerName: OBCC GmbH & Co. KG, services & research
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In addition to performance and stability improvements, the following new features have been added to the app:

- Feedback on notifications
- Share invitations to your own group of recipients from device to device via QR code
- Share file attachments
- Focus Topics with material and questions
- Option to enroll in a second group of recipients
- Interface and user experience improvements
